Vehicle Recognizer

This is an image classification model that can classify 33 different types of vehicles, including:

ATV, Airplane, Ambulance, Armored Tank, Autorickshaw, Bicycle, Boat, Buggy, Bulldozer, Cargo Ship, Cargo Truck, Crane, Excavator, Ferry, Helicopter, Hot Air Baloon, Microbus, Monster Truck, Motorcycle, Multi Purpose Vehicle, Ocean Liner, Police Car, Private Car, Rickshaw, SUV, Sail Boat, Semi Truck, Sports Car, Steam Roller, Train, Transport Bus, Truck and Yacht.

This Vehicle Recognizer model and this website deployment was made by Abrar Faiaz Adnan. For more info about this project, check out the
